statements: DELETE FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE crop_id = 1 AND growth_stage = 'vegetative';
DELETE FROM genetically_modified_crops WHERE development_stage = 'flowering' AND crop_name = 'Tomato';
DELETE FROM CropDevelopmentStages WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' AND growth_stage = 'Fruiting';
DELETE FROM CropGrowthData WHERE growth_date < '2022-05-01' AND growth_height > 20;
DELETE FROM crop_per_stage WHERE crop_id = 1 AND stage_id = 3;
DELETE FROM crop_stage_mapping WHERE growth_stage_id = 5 AND crop_id = 20;
DELETE FROM Growth_Stage_Log WHERE growth_stage = 'Harvest' AND growth_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Crop_History WHERE crop_id = 101 AND event_date < '2021-01-01';
